meeting_info.location: Videoconference/Council Chambers, City Hall, 1500 Marilla, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the June 17, 2024 Special Called City Plan Commission ForwardDallas Meeting, the June 20, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing, and the July 25, 2024 City Plan Commission Hearing.

agenda_items.title: Minor Amendment Case
agenda_items.description: An application for a minor amendment to an existing development and landscape plan on property zoned Planned Development District No. 501.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a TH-3(A) Townhouse District on property zoned an IR Industrial/Research District.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for a Specific Use Permit for a commercial amusement (inside) with a Class A dance hall.

agenda_items.title: Zoning Case - Consent
agenda_items.description: An application for an R-7.5(A) Single Family District on property zoned an A(A) Agricultural District.

agenda_items.title: Development Code Amendment
agenda_items.description: Consideration of amending Chapters 51 and 51A of the Dallas Development Code.
